name: Slice Night
description:
Slice your way to the TOP! Adventure through 21 action-packed, hand-crafted levels with tons of visual variety! Listen to beautiful music sourced from royalty free locations! explore your dreams as billy, the snot-nosed child! Try to beat the game as fast as possible? Maybe try to collect all the purple gems? Slice your mechanical enemies into RAINBOW-FLAVORED CONFETTI!

(includes both normal version and a version adjusted to look more pleasing to colorblind people)

(a controller with JoyToKey is recommended for optimal play)

-v1.0.1: added new steam banner compatible with the new beta
